reuters.title: TOTAL ERICKSON RESOURCES LTD <TLEXF> YEAR NET
reuters.body: Shr profit nine cts vs loss 45 cts Net profit 2,500,000 vs loss 9,900,000 Revs 16,800,000 vs 3,300,000 Note: 1986 net includes 2.6 mln dlr or nine ct a shr writedown of nine pct stake in <Trans-Canada Resources Ltd>. 1985 results reflect only six mths of mining operations due to merger of Erickson Gold Mines Ltd and Total Eastcan Exploration Ltd on June 30, 1985. Reuter 
